GLANCE TOOLS¶

This is the documentation to use the apps and tools created for the GLANCE project at the Department of Earth and Environment, Boston University.

This toolbox provides applications and a Javascript API for performing all the workflows used for the generation of global land cover maps using CCDC results, including:

  • Visualizing pixel-based time series and CCDC model fits

  • Performing change detection for entire study regions

  • Viewing CCDC coefficient images

  • Producing “synthetic” imagery

  • Land cover classification

  • Creating maps of land cover/use change

  • Collecting reference data

This documentation and the tools are a work in progress. This documentation is intended only for members of GLANCE project, including our international collaborators.For any questions contact us at: parevalo@bu.edu or bullocke@bu.edu.
